solution_line_template: He needs to save up ${season_months} x {monthly_supply_cost} = <<{season_months}*{monthly_supply_cost}={total_needed}>>{total_needed}
He has {off_season_months} months to earn this money because {months_in_year} - {season_months} = <<{months_in_year}-{season_months}={off_season_months}>>{off_season_months}
He needs to earn ${monthly_savings_goal} a month because {total_needed} / {off_season_months} = <<{total_needed}/{off_season_months}={monthly_savings_goal}>>{monthly_savings_goal}
He needs to do {chores_per_month} tasks a month because {monthly_savings_goal} / {charge_per_chore} = <<{monthly_savings_goal}/{charge_per_chore}={chores_per_month}>>{chores_per_month}
